name.title: Sauna System Name
name.description: The name for the sauna system, displayed in Homebridge.

hasSauna.title: Enable Sauna
hasSauna.description: Indicates if the sauna functionality is available.

hasSaunaSplitPhase.title: Sauna Split Phase
hasSaunaSplitPhase.description: False for 120V, True for 240V sauna configuration.

hasSteam.title: Enable Steam
hasSteam.description: Indicates if the steam functionality is available.

hasSteamSplitPhase.title: Steam Split Phase
hasSteamSplitPhase.description: False for 120V, True for 240V steam configuration.

hasLight.title: Enable Light Control
hasLight.description: Indicates if light control is available.

hasFan.title: Enable Fan Control
hasFan.description: Indicates if fan control is available.

inverseSaunaDoor.title: Inverse Sauna Door Logic
inverseSaunaDoor.description: True if sauna door sensor logic is inverted.

inverseSteamDoor.title: Inverse Steam Door Logic
inverseSteamDoor.description: True if steam door sensor logic is inverted.

temperatureUnitFahrenheit.title: Temperature Unit Fahrenheit
temperatureUnitFahrenheit.description: True for Fahrenheit, False for Celsius.

saunaPowerPins.title: Sauna Power Pins
saunaPowerPins.description: Array of GPIO pins for sauna power control.

steamPowerPins.title: Steam Power Pins
steamPowerPins.description: Array of GPIO pins for steam power control.

lightPin.title: Light Control Pin
lightPin.description: Optional GPIO pin for light control.

fanPin.title: Fan Control Pin
fanPin.description: Optional GPIO pin for fan control.

saunaDoorPin.title: Sauna Door Sensor Pin
saunaDoorPin.description: GPIO pin for sauna door sensor.

steamDoorPin.title: Steam Door Sensor Pin
steamDoorPin.description: GPIO pin for steam door sensor.

auxSensors.title: Auxiliary Sensors
auxSensors.description: Array of auxiliary sensors for additional readings.

name.title: Sensor Name
name.description: Name or label for the auxiliary sensor.

channel.title: ADC Channel
channel.description: ADC channel for the auxiliary sensor.

associatedSystem.title: Associated System
associatedSystem.description: System this sensor is associated with.

impactControl.title: Impact Control
impactControl.description: Whether this sensor impacts system control.
